content.question: A. Identify ONE geopolitical event that initiated change in the number of international boundaries in Europe between 1980 and 2013. B. Explain how nationalism can eliminate an international boundary. Describe an example from the maps shown. C. Explain how nationalism can create new international boundaries. Describe an example from the maps shown. D. Describe TWO ways supranationalism has affected the functions of international boundaries in Europe.

frqParts.text: A. Identify ONE geopolitical event that initiated change in the number of international boundaries in Europe between 1980 and 2013. B. skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
